Description of incident: A laptop computer and other personal              belongings were stolen from one of Semtech's vendors. The computer              was not stolen from a Semtech facility, but may have contained computerized              data relating to Semtech employees. Semtech declined to provide further              details of the incident, such as what personal employee data may have              been put at risk, when the theft happened or how long it took the              company to inform its workers of the potential breach.
